H0.text: Deer would most likely obtain its food energy solely from consumers.

H1.text: Grass is the organism that would most likely obtain its food energy only from consumers.

H2.text: Hawk is an organism that would most likely get its food energy only from consumers.

H3.text: Mushroom is an organism that would most likely get its food energy only from consumers.

A4.text: Hawks feed on a variety of smaller animals such as snakes, lizards, fish, mice, rabbits, squirrels, birds, or any other type of small game that is found on the ground.

A5.text: As an example, red-shouldered hawks eat smaller birds like doves as well as bugs like grasshoppers and crickets.
